title: KILLER WIVES: Human Speed Bump
itunes:title: KILLER WIVES: Human Speed Bump
description:
There's nothing more difficult for a woman in love to find out that her spouse is cheating. That's what happened to Clara Harris, and what followed has been a study in mariticide. Clara Harris said she did not mean to run over her husband with her Mercedes. Evidence shows she did doughnuts.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, Anchor on Court TV 
  • Dr. Bethany Marshall - Psychoanalyst, Beverly Hills 
  • Sheryl McCollum - Forensics Expert & Cold Case Investigative Research Institute Founder
  • Dr. Kris Sperry - Former Chief Medical Examiner State of Georgia
  • Ray Caputo - Lead News Anchor for Orlando's Morning News, 96.5 WDBO
  • Bobbie Bacha- Private Investigator, Blue Moon Investigations


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
